summary: Texture replacer for the Iron Shield including custom bump map
descriptionHtml:
[s]Adds a small decorative pattern to the Iron shield...[/s]
Changes ONLY the look of the Iron shield...[still a lowbie item]

Great for decorative purposes [shield and sword display]

Version Notes:
V0.9 -1.0 added small decorative pattern
V2.0 created new textures but uploaded some old ones -_-
V2.0a Optimised textures through [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5755]DDSopt[/url] - Uploaded correct textures

*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete the files shield, shield_n and shield_em.dds from ../Data/textures/armor/iron

*****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is prohibited without my prior consent.
*****************************************************************************
